Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier door problem at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
